sections.heading: S2. Ep9. Talking with Aaron McEwan about hybrid work environment, working from home, and the future of leadership

sections.content: In this week's podcast, we talk with +[Aaron McEwan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaronmcewan/)+ – a Psychologist, Business Coach, Strategic Advisor, and Vice President for Research & Advisory at +[Gartner](https://www.gartner.com.au/en)+, a specialist consulting organization within the HR space.

Aaron is about as well-placed a specialist as anyone in Australia to discuss the future of work conditions in a post-pandemic world and relate his knowledge to the Construction and Property industries.

We spoke at length about Hybrid work conditions, the effects that might have on Property and Construction industries, and the layout of cities. We also spoke about the work environment, the future of work culture, leadership, The Great Resignation, and employee attrition and engagement with their employers.
Amongst other things, in this podcast we discussed:

items: Impact of the pandemic on the Australian talent organization
Working from home – why employees seek it
Hybrid working model – the advantage it can give employers
The future of office spaces and the need to create 'an experience' for employees

sections.content: If you are interested in what makes employees 'tick' in a post-pandemic lockdown society, what the future of the workplace and working models look like – you'll find this a really fascinating view on the future workplace for construction and property professionals.
